Episodes.Title: Rules of Engagement
Episodes.Plot: Eight soldiers begin a dangerous 5-month mission to find and destroy improvised explosive devices in the opener of the documentary series following the Navy Explosive Ordnance Disposal Platoon 342 as they patrol Afghanistan.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Road of Blood
Episodes.Plot: Sam, Ricky and Matt help the Army clear the most heavily mined road in Northern Afghanistan; a deadly Taliban trap is discovered at an ANP Checkpoint.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Triggerman
Episodes.Plot: The platoon is looking for a Taliban triggerman and must detonate a live grenade.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Live Charge
Episodes.Plot: A road must be cleared for the return of 200 U.S. troops; Brad, Jeremy and Brendan try to dig up an IED at night.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: For Sgt. Kirspel
Episodes.Plot: A swarm of militia fighters complicates a mission for Ricky, Matt and Sam; Brendan's first chance to lead takes a turn for the worse.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Suicide Vest
Episodes.Plot: A mission to retrieve a suicide vest unfolds; Sam, Ricky and Matt must remove an IED near a Taliban stronghold.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Thanksgiving
Episodes.Plot: Sam, Ricky and Matt must clear a checkpoint that was recently abandoned by the Taliban; Chase and Brendan try to pull an intact pressure plate out of the ground.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Teamwork
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Ambush
Episodes.Plot: A route clearance mission finds an abandoned car that facilitates an ambush.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Firefight
Episodes.Plot: Brad, Ricky and Chase must reach soldiers who are trapped in a damaged vehicle amid a firefight with the Taliban in the series finale.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Donkeys
Episodes.Plot: A donkey breaches security; the team finds an unusual bomb on Ring Road.

Episodes.Title: Route X (1)
Episodes.Plot: Part 1 of 2. Ricky, Matt and Sam help the U.S. Army's Route Clearance Patrol clear one of the most heavily mined roads in Afghanistan.

Episodes.Title: Route X (2)
Episodes.Plot: Conclusion. Ricky, Matt and Sam help clear a dangerous road.

Episodes.Title: Weapons Tech
Episodes.Plot: Examining the technology the Navy EOD Platoon 342 uses to find and dispose of IEDs.

Episodes.Title: Behind the Scenes
Episodes.Plot: Behind the scenes of daily life in a war zone as cameras follow the men of EOD Platoon 3-4-2.

Episodes.Title: Reunion
Episodes.Plot: Josh Duhamel interviews four members of Navy EOD Platoon 3-4-2, who discuss their deployment and moments that changed their lives.
